ygData.subject: Firey Avenger
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, we all want this sword yes i know....with a damage of 35 nd speed of 45 it is by far the best weapon i have seen...oh and whats this? it cast Inferno?Hmmm
ygData.messageBody:
Ok,

we all want this sword yes i know....with a damage of 35 nd speed of 45 it
is by far the best weapon i have seen...oh and whats this? it cast
Inferno?Hmmm gee i think i want this sword, problem is i have no clue, nor
has anyone ive run into .... where you find this thing. MY guess is that its
somewhere in the bottom of solusek b dungeon. Which makes damn good sense to
me...seeing as how its the hardest dungeopn in the game. Heh Anyone on sol
ro wanna group with me and take a trip to Solusek Dungeon B with me? Heh im
level 34 now ... so im not THAT scared...well ok maybe a little...

hehe.
John Zwanenburg
Tips Support/Support Sipt
Tel: (613) 998-2745
